channel.title: CVE Feed for AMD -- Ryzen 5000 Series
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AMD -- Ryzen 5000 Series

item.title: CVE-2021-26346|2024-08-03T20:26:24.647Z -- amd -- ryzen%205000%20series
item.description: Failure to validate the integer operand in ASP (AMD Secure Processor) bootloader may allow an attacker to introduce an integer overflow in the L2 directory table in SPI flash resulting in a potential denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2021-26316|2024-08-03T20:19:20.402Z -- amd -- ryzen%205000%20series
item.description: Failure to validate the communication buffer and communication service in the BIOS may allow an attacker to tamper with the buffer resulting in potential SMM (System Management Mode) arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2021-26347|2024-08-03T20:26:25.052Z -- amd -- ryzen%205000%20series
item.description: Failure to validate the integer operand in ASP (AMD Secure Processor) bootloader may allow an attacker to introduce an integer overflow in the L2 directory table in SPI flash resulting in a potential denial of service.
